article_title: IDF confirms killing of Hamas leader's three sons.
sentence: IDF  confirms  killing  of  Hamas  leader's  three  sons.

article_title: IDF confirms killing of Hamas leader's three sons.
sentence: The  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  has  confirmed  that  its  aircraft  killed  three  sons  of  Hamas  leader  Ismail  Haniyeh,  describing  them  as  "Hamas  military  operatives".
